\n<Ranmaru>\."I’m stressed out... I’m super worried right now..."
\n<Ranmaru>\."Of course not. What kind of question even is that?!"
\n<Hayasaka>\."I work for the company that’s overseeing this
\n<Hayasaka>\."T-That doesn’t mean I’m the mastermind or anything!
I just know a bit more of what’s going on!"
\n<Hayasaka>\."I-I'm not too sure what'll happen next but..."
\n<Hayasaka>\."The company has been watching us for some time now..."
\n<Hayasaka>\."So much in fact that they’ve been able to make \c[2]AI’s\c[0] of
\n<Hayasaka>\."With those AI’s they’ve been able to run this death
game via computers for so long."
\n<Hayasaka>\."They ran the results so they can dictate everyone’s
chances to win the death game."
\n<Ranmaru>\."So you knew someone was going to die?!"
\n<Hayasaka>\."I'm sorry! I didn't think we could fight back!"
\n<Hayasaka>\."I didn’t think we would get to the first trial, let
\n<Ranmaru>\."Did you know Anzu was going to die?!"
\n<Ranmaru>\."Did you know Kurumada was going to die?!"
\n<Hayasaka>\."Well with the way he was acting to the others I
\n<Hayasaka>\."No! Not in any way could I have guessed they
\n<Hayasaka>\."That I was supposed to be executed for what I know."
\n<Hayasaka>\."Not only that but I know about the \c[2]main game\c[0].
\n<Ranmaru>\."How about we wait for everyone to get together then
\n<Hayasaka>\."Heheh.. That's what I was about to say..."
\n<Hayasaka>\."I-I’m sorry... I’m not going to say anything yet..."
\n<Hayasaka>\."It would be better to wait for everyone."
\n<Ranmaru>\."Let's go and try to find the others..."
